    72    vendorError,
    73    vendorLoading,
    74    mutateVendorData,
    75    resolvedFormValues,
    76    setStepValue,
    77    resetStepValue,
    78    vendorType,
    79  } = useDomesticVendorFormData(vendorId, UBAH_VENDOR_MAPPER_OPTIONS);
    80
    81  const effectiveVendorType = useMemo<FormType>(() => {
    82    const categoryId = Number(resolvedFormValues?.[1]?.businessCategoryId);
    83
    84    switch (categoryId) {
    85      case 1:
    86        return "manufaktur";
    87      case 2:
    88        return "atpm";
    89      case 3:
    90        return "distributor";
    91      case 4:
    92        return "importir";
    93      default:
    94        return vendorType as FormType;
    95    }
    96  }, [resolvedFormValues, vendorType]);
    97
    98  // Get user profile for role-based access control
    99  const { data: profile } = useGetProfile();
   100  const isApprover = profile?.permissions?.role?.includes("approver") || false;
   101
   102  // Handle loading and error states
   103  if (vendorLoading) {
   104    return (
   105      <div className="flex w-full items-center justify-center py-20">
   106        <div className="text-center">
   107          <div className="mb-4 h-8 w-8 animate-spin rounded-full border-4 border-gray-300 border-t-blue-600"></div>
   108          <p className="text-gray-600">Memuat data vendor...</p>
   109        </div>
   110      </div>
   111    );
   112  }
   113
   114  // Check for actual error from SWR
   115  if (vendorError) {
   116    toast.error("Tidak dapat menemukan data vendor. Vendor tidak ditemukan.");
   117    // Immediate redirect for SWR errors
   118    router.push("/vendor-domestik/vendor-terdaftar");
   119    return null;
   120  }
   121
   122  // Check for empty data (API service returns {} on error)
   123  if (!vendorData || Object.keys(vendorData).length === 0) {
   124    toast.error("Tidak dapat menemukan data vendor. Vendor tidak ditemukan.");
   125    // Immediate redirect for empty data
   126    router.push("/vendor-domestik/vendor-terdaftar");
   127    return null;
   128  }
   129
   130  // Transform form data to API payload (update version)
   131  const transformToApiPayload = (
   132    accountData: UpdateVendorFormInput,
   133    legalitasData: UpdateLegalitasFormInput,
   134    contractData: UpdateContractFormInput
   135  ): Payload => {
   136    return buildUpdateDomesticPayload({
   137      accountData,
   138      legalitasData,
   139      contractData,
   140      vendorType: effectiveVendorType,
   141      vendorId: vendorId || "",
   142      status: "pending_approval",
   143    });
   144  };
   145
   146  // Handle API errors with user-friendly messages
   147  const handleApiError = (error: unknown): string => {
   148    if (error instanceof Error) {
   149      if (
   150        error.message.includes("Network Error") ||
   151        error.message.includes("fetch")
   152      ) {
   153        return "Terjadi kesalahan jaringan. Silakan periksa koneksi internet Anda.";
   154      }
   155
   156      if (error.message.includes("400")) {
   157        return "Data yang dikirim tidak valid. Silakan periksa kembali formulir.";
   158      }
   159
   160      if (error.message.includes("401")) {
   161        return "Sesi Anda telah berakhir. Silakan login kembali.";
   162      }
   163
   164      if (error.message.includes("403")) {
   165        return "Anda tidak memiliki izin untuk melakukan aksi ini.";
   166      }
   167
   168      if (error.message.includes("404")) {
   169        return "Vendor tidak ditemukan.";
   170      }
   171
   172      if (error.message.includes("409")) {
   173        return "Terjadi konflik data. Silakan coba lagi.";
   174      }
   175
   176      if (
   177        error.message.includes("422") ||
   178        error.message.includes("validation")
   179      ) {
   180        return "Validasi data gagal. Silakan periksa kembali data yang dimasukkan.";
   181      }
   182
   183      if (error.message.includes("500")) {
   184        return "Terjadi kesalahan pada server. Silakan coba lagi nanti.";
   185      }
   186
   187      return error.message || "Terjadi kesalahan yang tidak diketahui.";
   188    }
   189
   190    return "Terjadi kesalahan yang tidak diketahui. Silakan coba lagi.";
   191  };
   192
   193  // Update vendor data
   194  const updateVendor = async (
   195    accountData: UpdateVendorFormInput,
   196    legalitasData: UpdateLegalitasFormInput,
   197    contractData: UpdateContractFormInput
   198  ): Promise<any | null> => {
   199    try {
   200      setUpdateState((prev) => ({ ...prev, isUpdating: true, error: null }));
   201
   202      if (!vendorId) {
   203        throw new Error("Vendor ID is required for updates");
   204      }
   205
   206      const apiPayload = transformToApiPayload(
   207        accountData,
   208        legalitasData,
   209        contractData
   210      );
   211
   212      const response = await updateSellerDomestic(apiPayload);
   213
   214      if (!response) {
   215        throw new Error("Tidak ada respons dari server. Silakan coba lagi.");
   216      }
   217
   218      // Check if response indicates success
   219      if (response.success === false) {
   220        throw new Error(response.message || "Gagal memperbarui vendor");
   221      }
   222
   223      return response;
   224    } catch (error) {
   225      const errorMessage = handleApiError(error);
   226      setUpdateState((prev) => ({ ...prev, error: errorMessage }));
   227
   228      return null;
   229    } finally {
   230      setUpdateState((prev) => ({ ...prev, isUpdating: false }));
   231    }
   232  };
   233
   234  // Breadcrumb data based on current step
   235  const breadcrumbData: BreadcrumbItem[] = [
   236    { text: "Informasi Akun", active: step === 1 },
   237    { text: "Legalitas", active: step === 2 },
   238    { text: "Kontrak", active: step === 3 },
   239  ];
   240
   241  return (
   242    <div className="w-full">
   243      <PageTitle className="self-start">Ubah Vendor Domestik</PageTitle>
   244
   245      <BreadcrumbMini data={breadcrumbData} setStep={setStep} />
   246
   247      <div className={cn("w-full", SHOW_FOOTER_IDENTIFIKASI && "mb-[320px]")}>
   248        {step === 1 ? (
   249          <FormAccountInformation
   250            defaultValues={resolvedFormValues[1] || undefined}
   251            onSubmit={(values) => {
   252              const previousCategoryId = Number(
   253                resolvedFormValues?.[1]?.businessCategoryId
   254              );
   255              const nextCategoryId = Number(values?.businessCategoryId);
   256
   257              setStepValue(1, values);
   258
   259              if (
   260                Number.isFinite(previousCategoryId) &&
   261                Number.isFinite(nextCategoryId) &&
   262                previousCategoryId !== nextCategoryId
   263              ) {
   264                resetStepValue(2);
   265                resetStepValue(3);
   266              }
   267
   268              setStep(2);
   269            }}
   270          />
   271        ) : step === 2 ? (
   272          <FormLegalitas
   273            type={effectiveVendorType}
   274            defaultValues={resolvedFormValues[2] || undefined}
   275            documentHistory={vendorData?.legalitas?.documentHistory}
   276            onBack={() => setStep(1)}
   277            onSubmit={(values) => {
   278              setStepValue(2, values);
   279              setStep(3);
   280            }}
   281          />
   282        ) : step === 3 ? (
   283          <FormKontrak
   284            defaultValues={resolvedFormValues[3] || undefined}
   285            onBack={() => setStep(2)}
   286            contractHistory={vendorData?.contract?.contractHistory}
   287            sellerId={vendorId}
   288            onContractUpdate={async () => mutateVendorData()}
   289            onSubmit={async (values) => {
   290              // Prevent submission for approvers
   291              if (isApprover) {
   292                toast.error("Approver tidak dapat mengubah data vendor");
   293                return;
   294              }
   295
   296              try {
   297                await updateVendor(
   298                  resolvedFormValues[1], // Account Information
   299                  resolvedFormValues[2], // Legalitas Information (normalized in payload mapper)
   300                  values // Contract Information
   301                );
   302
   303                await Promise.all([
   304                  mutateVendorData(),
   305                  globalMutate(
   306                    (key) =>
   307                      typeof key === "string" &&
   308                      (key.startsWith(
   309                        `domestic-vendor-form-data-${vendorId}-`
   310                      ) ||
   311                        key === `domestic-seller-detail-${vendorId}` ||
   312                        key === `international-seller-detail-${vendorId}` ||
   313                        key.startsWith("vendors-domestic-list-")),
   314                    undefined,
   315                    { revalidate: true }
   316                  ),
   317                ]);
   318
   319                toast.success("Vendor berhasil diperbarui!");
   320                router.push("/vendor-domestik/vendor-terdaftar");
   321              } catch (error) {
   322                console.error(" UBAH_DEBUG - Error in onSubmit:", error);
   323                // Error is already handled in updateVendor, but show toast if needed
   324                if (updateState.error) {
   325                  toast.error(updateState.error);
   326                }
   327              }
   328            }}
   329          />
   330        ) : null}
   331      </div>
   332
   333      <ModalWarning
   334        open={false}
   335        description="Nama perusahaan telah terdaftar"
   336        onOpenChange={() => {}}
   337      />
   338      <ModalWarning
   339        open={false}
   340        description="Email  telah terdaftar"
   341        onOpenChange={() => {}}
   342      />
   343      <ModalWarning
   344        open={false}
   345        description="Nomor whatsapp  telah terdaftar"
   346        onOpenChange={() => {}}
   347      />
   348      <ModalSuccess open={false} onOpenChange={() => {}} />
   349    </div>
   350  );
   351};
   352
   353export default UbahVendorDomestik;
   354","metadata":{"truncated":false,"lineCount":354,"filePath":"src/container/UbahVendorDomestik/UbahVendorDomestik.tsx","preview":false}}}}

data: {"type":"data-action","id":"call_46792ed78e0c4ea9abd3324c","data":{"id":"call_46792ed78e0c4ea9abd3324c","ts":1771011289890,"kind":"tool","title":"read completed","subtitle":"{"content":"     1\"use client\";\n     2\n     3import { useParams, useRouter } from \"next/navi","toolCallId":"call_46792ed78e0c4ea9abd3324c","agentId":"019c587e-3631-7796-a396-972cad19210e"}}

data: {"type":"data-tool-result","id":"call_508f2c448f59468c8c650d9f","data":{"toolCallId":"call_508f2c448f59468c8c650d9f","result":{"content":"     1"use client";
     2
     3import { useParams, useRouter } from "next/navigation";
     4import { useState } from "react";
     5
     6import { toast } from "@muatmuat/ui/Toaster";
     7
     8import { useGetProfile } from "@/services/globals/getProfile";
     9import { updateSellerDomestic } from "@/services/vendor-domestik/updateSellerDomestic";
    10
    11import { BreadcrumbMini } from "@/components/BreadcrumbMini/BreadcrumbMini";
    12import { ModalSuccess } from "@/components/Modal/ModalSuccess";
    13import { ModalWarning } from "@/components/Modal/ModalWarning";
    14import PageTitle from "@/components/PageTitle/PageTitle";
    15
    16import { useDomesticVendorFormData } from "@/hooks/vendor-domestik/useDomesticVendorFormData";
    17
    18import FormAccountInformation from "./components/FormAccountInformation";
    19import FormKontrak from "./components/FormKontrak";
    20import FormLegalitas from "./components/FormLegalitas";
    21import {
    22  type TransformedLegalitasFormInput,
    23  type UpdateContractFormInput,
    24  type UpdateLegalitasFormInput,
    25  type UpdateVendorFormInput,
    26  type VendorUpdateState,
    27  transformToApiPayload,
    28} from "./components/types";
    29
    30// TypeScript interfaces
    31interface BreadcrumbItem {
    32  text: string;
    33  active: boolean;
    34}
    35
    36const VERIFIKASI_VENDOR_MAPPER_OPTIONS = {
    37  businessIdMode: "string" as const,
    38  includeVerificationFields: true,
    39  includeSppkpField: true,
    40  importirCertificateKey: "suratCOO" as const,
    41};
    42
    43const VerifikasiVendorDomestik = () => {
    44  const params = useParams();
    45  const router = useRouter();
    46  const vendorId = params.id as string;
    47
    48  const [step, setStep] = useState<number>(1);
    49  const [updateState, setUpdateState] = useState<VendorUpdateState>({
    50    vendorId: vendorId,
    51    isLoading: true,
    52    isUpdating: false,
    53    error: null,
    54  });
    55
    56  // Modal states for success/error handling
    57  const [warningModal, setWarningModal] = useState<{
    58    status: "success" | "error";
    59    message: string;
    60  } | null>(null);
    61
    62  const {
    63    vendorData,
    64    vendorError,
    65    vendorLoading,
    66    resolvedFormValues,
    67    vendorType,
    68  } = useDomesticVendorFormData(vendorId, VERIFIKASI_VENDOR_MAPPER_OPTIONS);
    69
    70  // Get current user profile for approver ID
    71  const { data: profile } = useGetProfile();
    72
    73  // Update vendor data
    74  const updateVendor = async (
    75    accountData: UpdateVendorFormInput,
    76    legalitasData: TransformedLegalitasFormInput,
    77    contractData: UpdateContractFormInput
    78  ): Promise<any> => {
    79    try {
    80      setUpdateState((prev) => ({ ...prev, isUpdating: true, error: null }));
    81
    82      if (!vendorId) {
    83        throw new Error("Vendor ID is required for updates");
    84      }
    85
    86      const apiPayload = transformToApiPayload(
    87        accountData,
    88        legalitasData,
    89        contractData,
    90        profile?.adminId
    91      );
    92
    93      // Set vendor ID
    94      apiPayload.id = vendorId;
    95
    96      const response = await updateSellerDomestic(apiPayload);
    97
    98      if (!response) {
    99        throw new Error("Tidak ada respons dari server. Silakan coba lagi.");
   100      }
   101
   102      if (response.success === false) {
   103        throw new Error(response.message || "Gagal memverifikasi vendor");
   104      }
   105
   106      // return response;
   107    } finally {
   108      // setUpdateState((prev) => ({ ...prev, isUpdating: false }));
   109    }
   110  };
   111
   112  if (vendorLoading) {
   113    return (
   114      <div className="flex w-full items-center justify-center py-20">
   115        <div className="text-center">
   116          <div className="mb-4 h-8 w-8 animate-spin rounded-full border-4 border-gray-300 border-t-blue-600"></div>
   117          <p className="text-gray-600">Memuat data vendor...</p>
   118        </div>
   119      </div>
   120    );
   121  }
   122
   123  if (vendorError) {
   124    toast.error("Tidak dapat menemukan data vendor. Vendor tidak ditemukan.");
   125    router.push("/vendor-domestik/vendor-terdaftar");
   126    return null;
   127  }
   128
   129  if (!vendorData || Object.keys(vendorData).length === 0) {
   130    toast.error("Tidak dapat menemukan data vendor. Vendor tidak ditemukan.");
   131    router.push("/vendor-domestik/vendor-terdaftar");
   132    return null;
   133  }
   134
   135  // Breadcrumb data based on current step
   136  const breadcrumbData: BreadcrumbItem[] = [
   137    { text: "Informasi Akun", active: step === 1 },
   138    { text: "Legalitas", active: step === 2 },
   139    { text: "Kontrak", active: step === 3 },
   140  ];
   141
   142  return (
   143    <div className="w-full">
   144      {/* Header */}
   145      <div className="flex items-center justify-between gap-2 self-stretch">
   146        <PageTitle className="self-start">Verifikasi Vendor Domestik</PageTitle>
   147      </div>
   148
   149      {/* Breadcrumb Navigation */}
   150      <BreadcrumbMini data={breadcrumbData} setStep={setStep} />
   151
   152      {/* Content Area */}
   153      <div className="self-stretch">
   154        {step === 1 ? (
   155          <FormAccountInformation
   156            defaultValues={resolvedFormValues[1] || undefined}
   157            onNext={() => setStep(2)}
   158          />
   159        ) : step === 2 ? (
   160          <FormLegalitas
   161            defaultValues={
   162              (resolvedFormValues[2] as Partial<UpdateLegalitasFormInput>) ||
   163              undefined
   164            }
   165            onBack={() => setStep(1)}
   166            onNext={() => setStep(3)}
   167            type={vendorType}
   168          />
   169        ) : step === 3 ? (
   170          <FormKontrak
   171            defaultValues={resolvedFormValues[3] || undefined}
   172            onBack={() => setStep(2)}
   173            onSubmit={async (values: UpdateContractFormInput) => {
   174              try {
   175                await updateVendor(
   176                  resolvedFormValues[1], // Account Information
   177                  resolvedFormValues[2], // Legalitas Information
   178                  values // Contract Information
   179                );
   180
   181                // Show success modal instead of toast for better UX
   182                setWarningModal({
   183                  status: "success",
   184                  message: "Vendor berhasil diverifikasi!",
   185                });
   186
   187                // Redirect after a short delay to allow user to see the success message
   188                setTimeout(() => {
   189                  router.push("/vendor-domestik/vendor-terdaftar");
   190                }, 3000);
   191              } catch {
   192                if (updateState.error) {
   193                  setWarningModal({
   194                    status: "error",
   195                    message: updateState.error,
   196                  });
   197                }
   198              }
   199            }}
   200            contractHistory={vendorData?.contract?.contractHistory}
   201          />
   202        ) : null}
   203      </div>
   204
   205      {/* Success/Warning Modal */}
   206      {warningModal && (
   207        <>
   208          {warningModal.status === "success" ? (
   209            <ModalSuccess
   210              open={!!warningModal}
   211              onOpenChange={() => setWarningModal(null)}
   212              title={warningModal.message}
   213            />
   214          ) : (
   215            <ModalWarning
   216              open={!!warningModal}
   217              onOpenChange={() => setWarningModal(null)}
   218              title="Error"
   219              description={warningModal.message}
   220            />
   221          )}
   222        </>
   223      )}
   224    </div>
   225  );
   226};
   227
   228export default VerifikasiVendorDomestik;

    15import FormKontrak from "./components/FormKontrak";
    16import FormLegalitas from "./components/FormLegalitas";
    17import TableRiwayat from "./components/TableRiwayat";

    29

    40
    41  // Handle loading and error states

    46          <div className="mb-4 h-8 w-8 animate-spin rounded-full border-4 border-gray-300 border-t-blue-600"></div>
    47          <p className="text-gray-600">Memuat data vendor...</p>

    53  // Check for actual error from SWR

    56    router.push("/vendor-domestik/vendor-terdaftar");

    59
    60  // Check for empty data (API service returns {} on error)

    77
    78        {/* "Utama" / "Riwayat" Toggle */}
    79        <div className="flex h-[28px] w-[200px] text-xs font-semibold">

    89          >
    90            Utama
    91          </button>
    92          <button
    93            type="button"
    94            onClick={() => setActiveTab("riwayat")}
    95            className={cn(
    96              "flex flex-1 items-center justify-center rounded-r-[4px] border border-l-0 border-[#A8A8A8]",
    97              activeTab === "riwayat"
    98                ? "bg-[#A8A8A8] text-[#1B1B1B]"
    99                : "bg-white text-[#1B1B1B]"
   100            )}
   101          >
   102            Riwayat
   103          </button>
   104        </div>
   105      </div>
   106
   107      {/* Render content based on active tab */}
   108      {activeTab === "utama" ? (
   109        <>
   110          <BreadcrumbMini data={breadcrumbData} setStep={setStep} />
   111          {step === 1 ? (

   114              onNext={() => setStep(2)}
   115              disabled={true}
   116            />
   117          ) : step === 2 ? (
   118            <FormLegalitas
   119              defaultValues={formValuesData[2] || undefined}
   120              onBack={() => setStep(1)}
   121              onNext={() => setStep(3)}
   122              type={vendorType}
   123              documentHistory={[]}
   124              disabled={true}
   125            />
   126          ) : step === 3 ? (
   127            <FormKontrak
   128              defaultValues={formValuesData[3] || undefined}
   129              onBack={() => setStep(2)}
   130              disabled={true}
   131            />
   132          ) : null}
   133        </>
   134      ) : (
   135        <TableRiwayat sellerId={vendorId} />
   136      )}
   137    </div>
   138  );
   139};
   140
   141export default DetailVendorDomestik;

    69const RegisterVendorDomestik = () => {

    78  // Map business category ID to vendor type

    82    // This mapping should match your business categories from the API

   113  const formatValidationErrors = (

   133  // Transform form data to API payload

   146
   147  // Helper function to check if a value is meaningfully filled

   155

   163  ): Partial<Payload> => {

   187        if (isFilled(accountData.picName))

   189        if (isFilled(accountData.picEmail))
   190          basePayload.picEmail = accountData.picEmail;
   191        if (isFilled(accountData.picPhoneNumber))
   192          basePayload.picPhoneNumber = accountData.picPhoneNumber;
   193        if (isFilled(accountData.picPosition))

   195
   196        // Location information - only include if we have meaningful location data
   197        if (accountData.location) {

   209            basePayload.cityId = accountData.location.city.cityId;
   210          if (isFilled(accountData.location.province?.provinceName))

   216
   217          // Only include coordinates if they're meaningful (not 0,0)

   224        if (isFilled(accountData.npwp)) basePayload.npwp = accountData.npwp;

   239
   240        // Handle company phone numbers - only include if we have phones and they're meaningful

   245          if (meaningfulPhones.length > 0) {

   269        if (isFilled(legalitasData.directorIdFile))

   285
   286          if (meaningfulBrands.length > 0) {
   287            basePayload.brands = meaningfulBrands.map((brand: any) => {
   288              // Map to service Brand type structure

   290                name: brand.brandName || brand.brand, // Only include if filled
   291              };
   292
   293              // Map common file paths to service Brand fields - only if filled
   294              if (isFilled(brand.suratPemegangMerekDagang)) {
   295                serviceBrand.suratPemegangMerekDagang =

   297                if (isFilled(brand.suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate)) {
   298                  serviceBrand.suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate =

   301              }
   302
   303              // Type-specific field mappings - only include filled fields
   304              if (vendorType === "manufaktur") {
   305                // Manufacturer specific mappings
   306                if (isFilled(brand.sertifikatHAKI)) {
   307                  serviceBrand.sertifikatHAKI = brand.sertifikatHAKI;
   308                  if (isFilled(brand.sertifikatHAKIIssueDate)) {
   309                    serviceBrand.sertifikatHAKIIssueDate =
   310                      brand.sertifikatHAKIIssueDate;
   311                  }
   312                }
   313                if (isFilled(brand.suratCOO)) {
   314                  serviceBrand.suratCOO = brand.suratCOO;
   315                }
   316              } else if (vendorType === "atpm") {
   317                // ATPM mappings - intellectual property fields (same files as trademark for ATPM)
   318                if (isFilled(brand.suratPemegangMerekDagang)) {
   319                  serviceBrand.sertifikatHAKI = brand.suratPemegangMerekDagang;
   320                  serviceBrand.sertifikatHAKIIssueDate =
   321                    brand.suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate ||
   322                    format(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd");
   323                }
   324              } else if (vendorType === "distributor") {

   327                  serviceBrand.suratPemegangMerekDagang =
   328                    brand.suratPemegangMerekDagang;
   329                  if (isFilled(brand.suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate)) {
   330                    serviceBrand.suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate =
   331                      brand.suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate;
   332                  }
   333
   334                  // Add intellectual property fields (same data as trademark per BE requirement)
   335                  serviceBrand.sertifikatHAKI = brand.suratPemegangMerekDagang;
   336                  if (isFilled(brand.suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate)) {
   337                    serviceBrand.sertifikatHAKIIssueDate =
   338                      brand.suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate;
   339                  }
   340                }
   341                if (isFilled(brand.suratPenunjukanKeagenan)) {
   342                  serviceBrand.suratPenunjukanKeagenan =
   343                    brand.suratPenunjukanKeagenan;
   344                  serviceBrand.agencyAppointmentLetter =
   345                    brand.suratPenunjukanKeagenan;
   346                }
   347              } else if (vendorType === "importir") {
   348                // Importir mappings
   349                if (isFilled(brand.suratPemegangMerekDagang)) {
   350                  serviceBrand.suratPemegangMerekDagang =
   351                    brand.suratPemegangMerekDagang;
   352                  if (isFilled(brand.suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate)) {
   353                    serviceBrand.suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate =
   354                      brand.suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate;
   355                  }
   356
   357                  // Add intellectual property fields (same data as trademark per BE requirement)
   358                  serviceBrand.sertifikatHAKI = brand.suratPemegangMerekDagang;
   359                  if (isFilled(brand.suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate)) {
   360                    serviceBrand.sertifikatHAKIIssueDate =
   361                      brand.suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate;
   362                  }
   363                }
   364                if (isFilled(brand.suratCOO)) {
   365                  serviceBrand.suratCOO = brand.suratCOO;
   366                }
   367              }
   368
   369              return serviceBrand;
   370            });
   371          }
   372        }
   373
   374        // Handle documents - only include filled documents
   375        const documents = Array.isArray(basePayload.documents)
   376          ? [...basePayload.documents]
   377          : [];
   378
   379        // NIB (Business Identification Number)
   380        if (isFilled(legalitasData.nibFile)) {
   381          documents.push({
   382            documentType: "nib" as const,
   383            filePath: legalitasData.nibFile,
   384            issueDate: format(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
   385          });
   386        }
   387
   388        // Incorporation Certificate (Deed of Establishment)
   389        if (isFilled(legalitasData.aktaPendirian)) {
   390          documents.push({
   391            documentType: "akta_pendirian" as const,
   392            filePath: legalitasData.aktaPendirian,
   393            issueDate: format(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
   394          });
   395        }
   396
   397        // SK Kemenkumham (Kemenkumham Decree)
   398        if (isFilled(legalitasData.skKemenkumham)) {
   399          documents.push({
   400            documentType: "sk_kemenkumham" as const,
   401            filePath: legalitasData.skKemenkumham,
   402            issueDate: format(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
   403          });
   404        }
   405
   406        // Deed of Change (optional) - Latest Amendment Deed
   407        if (isFilled(legalitasData.aktaPerubahanTerbaru)) {
   408          documents.push({
   409            documentType: "akta_perubahan_terbaru" as const,
   410            filePath: legalitasData.aktaPerubahanTerbaru,
   411            issueDate: format(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
   412          });
   413        }
   414
   415        // SK Kemenkumham Change (optional) - Latest Kemenkumham Decree
   416        if (isFilled(legalitasData.skKemenkumhamTerbaru)) {
   417          documents.push({
   418            documentType: "sk_kemenkumham_terbaru" as const,
   419            filePath: legalitasData.skKemenkumhamTerbaru,
   420            issueDate: format(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
   421          });
   422        }
   423
   424        // Only include documents array if we have meaningful documents
   425        if (documents.length > 0) {
   426          basePayload.documents = documents;
   427        }
   428      }
   429    }
   430
   431    // Contract Information (Step 3) - only include filled contract data
   432    if (completedSteps[3] || step === 3) {
   433      const contractData =
   434        completedSteps[3] || (currentStepValues as ContractFormInput);
   435      if (contractData) {
   436        // Build contract object only with filled fields
   437        const contract: any = {};
   438
   439        if (isFilled(contractData.bankName))
   440          contract.bankName = contractData.bankName;
   441        if (isFilled(contractData.accountNumber))
   442          contract.accountNumber = contractData.accountNumber;
   443        if (isFilled(contractData.accountHolder))
   444          contract.accountHolder = contractData.accountHolder;
   445        if (isFilled(contractData.financePicName))
   446          contract.financePicName = contractData.financePicName;
   447        if (isFilled(contractData.agreementNumber))
   448          contract.agreementNumber = contractData.agreementNumber;
   449        if (isFilled(contractData.agreementFilePath))
   450          contract.agreementFilePath = contractData.agreementFilePath;
   451        if (isFilled(contractData.startDate))
   452          contract.startDate = contractData.startDate;
   453
   454        // Calculate end date from start date and duration (only if both are filled)
   455        if (
   456          isFilled(contractData.startDate) &&
   457          isFilled(contractData.contractDuration)
   458        ) {
   459          const startDateObj = new Date(contractData.startDate);
   460          const endDateObj = new Date(startDateObj);
   461          endDateObj.setFullYear(
   462            endDateObj.getFullYear() + contractData.contractDuration
   463          );
   464          contract.endDate = format(endDateObj, "yyyy-MM-dd");
   465        }
   466
   467        if (isFilled(contractData.notes)) contract.notes = contractData.notes;
   468        if (isFilled(contractData.contractDuration))
   469          contract.contractDuration = contractData.contractDuration;
   470
   471        // Only include contract object if it has meaningful fields
   472        if (Object.keys(contract).length > 0) {
   473          basePayload.contract = contract;
   474        }
   475      }
   476    }
   477
   478    // Add draft status
   479    basePayload.status = "draft";
   480
   481    return basePayload;
   482  };
   483
   484  // Save draft functionality
   485  const handleSaveDraft = async (): Promise<DraftSaveResult> => {
   486    try {
   487      // Get current step values from the active form
   488      let currentStepValues: Partial<
   489        VendorFormInput | LegalitasFormInput | ContractFormInput
   490      > = {};
   491
   492      if (draftRefs[step]?.current) {
   493        currentStepValues = draftRefs[step].current!();
   494      }
   495
   496      // Create draft data structure with API payload format
   497      const draftData: DraftData = {
   498        currentStep: step,
   499        draftPayload: transformToDraftPayload(
   500          step,
   501          currentStepValues,
   502          formValues
   503        ),
   504        formValues: { ...formValues },
   505        currentStepData: currentStepValues,
   506        metadata: {
   507          lastSaved: new Date().toISOString(),
   508          version: "1.0",
   509          isComplete: false,
   510        },
   511      };
   512
   513      // Call API to save draft
   514
   515      const response = await postCreateDomesticSeller(draftData.draftPayload);
   516
   517      if (!response) {
   518        throw new Error("Tidak ada respons dari server saat menyimpan draft.");
   519      }
   520
   521      // Show success message with response info
   522      setWarningModal({
   523        status: "success",
   524        message: `Draft berhasil disimpan${response?.id ? ` (ID: ${response.id})` : ""}`,
   525      });
   526
   527      return {
   528        success: true,
   529        message: "Draft berhasil disimpan",
   530        data: response,
   531      };
   532    } catch (error) {
   533      console.error("[Save Draft] Error:", error);
   534
   535      if (error instanceof XiorError) {
   536        const apiMessage =
   537          typeof error.response?.data?.Message === "string"
   538            ? error.response.data.Message
   539            : "";
   540        const errorData = error.response?.data?.Data;
   541
   542        if (Array.isArray(errorData) && errorData.length > 0) {
   543          const detailsMessage = formatValidationErrors(errorData);
   544          const validationMessage = detailsMessage
   545            ? `Failed to save draft\n${detailsMessage}`
   546            : "Failed to save draft";
   547
   548          setWarningModal({
   549            status: "error",
   550            message: validationMessage,
   551          });
   552
   553          return {
   554            success: false,
   555            message: validationMessage,
   556            error: validationMessage,
   557          };
   558        }
   559
   560        const fallbackMessage =
   561          apiMessage || "Gagal menyimpan draft. Silakan coba lagi.";
   562        setWarningModal({
   563          status: "error",
   564          message: fallbackMessage,
   565        });
   566
   567        return {
   568          success: false,
   569          message: fallbackMessage,
   570          error: fallbackMessage,
   571        };
   572      } else {
   573        setWarningModal({
   574          status: "error",
   575          message: "Gagal menyimpan draft. Silakan coba lagi.",
   576        });
   577      }
   578
   579      return {
   580        success: false,
   581        message: "Gagal menyimpan draft",
   582        error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : "Unknown error",
   583      };
   584    }
   585  };
   586
   587  // Submit vendor registration
   588  const submitRegistration = async (
   589    contractData: ContractFormInput
   590  ): Promise<void> => {
   591    try {
   592      // Store contract data in state before submission
   593      setFormValues((prev) => ({ ...prev, 3: contractData }));
   594
   595      // Validate that we have all required form data
   596      if (!formValues[1] || !formValues[2]) {
   597        throw new Error(
   598          "Data form tidak lengkap. Silakan lengkapi semua langkah."
   599        );
   600      }
   601
   602      // Transform form data to API payload
   603      const apiPayload = transformToApiPayload(
   604        formValues[1], // Account Information
   605        formValues[2], // Legalitas Information
   606        contractData // Contract Information
   607      );
   608
   609      // Call API service
   610      const response = await postCreateDomesticSeller(apiPayload);
   611
   612      if (!response) {
   613        throw new Error("Tidak ada respons dari server. Silakan coba lagi.");
   614      }
   615
   616      // Show success modal
   617      setWarningModal({
   618        status: "success",
   619        message: "Berhasil Menyimpan Data",
   620      });
   621    } catch (error) {
   622      console.error("[VendorRegistration] Error:", error);
   623
   624      if (error instanceof XiorError && error.response?.data?.Data) {
   625        // Extract the first error message from the Data array
   626        const errorData = error.response.data.Data;
   627        const firstError =
   628          Array.isArray(errorData) && errorData.length > 0
   629            ? errorData[0].message
   630            : "Terjadi kesalahan yang tidak diketahui";
   631
   632        setWarningModal({
   633          status: "error",
   634          message: firstError,
   635        });
   636      } else {
   637        setWarningModal({
   638          status: "error",
   639          message: "Terjadi kesalahan. Silakan coba lagi.",
   640        });
   641      }
   642    }
   643  };
   644
   645  // Breadcrumb data based on current step
   646  const breadcrumbData: BreadcrumbItem[] = [
   647    { text: "Informasi Akun", active: step === 1 },
   648    { text: "Legalitas", active: step === 2 },
   649    { text: "Kontrak", active: step === 3 },
   650  ];
   651
   652  // Handle breadcrumb navigation with validation
   653  const handleBreadcrumbClick = (targetStep: number) => {
   654    // Allow navigation to current step
   655    if (targetStep === step) return;
   656
   657    // Step 1 is always accessible
   658    if (targetStep === 1) {
   659      setStep(1);
   660      return;
   661    }
   662
   663    // Step 2 is only accessible if step 1 is completed
   664    if (targetStep === 2 && formValues[1]) {
   665      setStep(2);
   666      return;
   667    }
   668
   669    // Step 3 is only accessible if step 2 is completed
   670    if (targetStep === 3 && formValues[2]) {
   671      setStep(3);
   672      return;
   673    }
   674
   675    // If we reach here, user is trying to access an incomplete step
   676    // Do nothing (navigation blocked)
   677  };
   678
   679  return (
   680    <div className="w-full">
   681      <PageTitle className="self-start">Register Vendor Domestik</PageTitle>
   682
   683      <BreadcrumbMini
   684        data={breadcrumbData}
   685        setStep={handleBreadcrumbClick}
   686        right={
   687          <Button
   688            variant="muatparts-primary-secondary"
   689            onClick={handleSaveDraft}
   690            type="button"
   691          >
   692            Save Draft
   693          </Button>
   694        }
   695      />
   696
   697      {step === 1 ? (
   698        <FormAccountInformation
   699          defaultValues={formValues[1] || undefined}
   700          draftRef={draftRefs[1]}
   701          onSubmit={(values) => {
   702            setFormValues((prev) => ({ ...prev, 1: values }));
   703            setStep(2);
   704          }}
   705        />
   706      ) : step === 2 ? (
   707        <FormLegalitas
   708          type={vendorType}
   709          defaultValues={formValues[2] || undefined}
   710          draftRef={draftRefs[2]}
   711          onSubmit={(values) => {
   712            setFormValues((prev) => ({ ...prev, 2: values as any }));
   713            setStep(3);
   714          }}
   715          onBack={() => setStep(1)}
   716        />
   717      ) : step === 3 ? (
   718        <FormKontrak
   719          draftRef={draftRefs[3]}
   720          onSubmit={submitRegistration}
   721          onBack={() => setStep(2)}
   722          defaultValues={formValues[3] || undefined}
   723        />
   724      ) : null}
   725
   726      {/* Dynamic Modal - shows based on warningModal state */}
   727      {warningModal?.status === "error" && (
   728        <ModalWarning
   729          open={true}
   730          description={warningModal.message}
   731          onOpenChange={() => setWarningModal(null)}
   732        />
   733      )}
   734
   735      {warningModal?.status === "success" && (
   736        <ModalSuccess
   737          title={warningModal.message}
   738          open={true}
   739          onOpenChange={() => setWarningModal(null)}
   740          onConfirm={() => router.push("/vendor-domestik/vendor-terdaftar")}
   741        />
   742      )}
   743    </div>
   744  );
   745};
   746
   747export default RegisterVendorDomestik;
   748","metadata":{"truncated":false,"lineCount":748,"filePath":"src/container/RegisterVendorDomestik/RegisterVendorDomestik.tsx","preview":false}}}}

data: {"type":"data-tool-result","id":"call_57777445dc4d45cea1d92294","data":{"toolCallId":"call_57777445dc4d45cea1d92294","result":{"content":"     1"use client";
     2
     3import { useRouter } from "next/navigation";
     4import React, { useState } from "react";
     5
     6import { Button } from "@muatmuat/ui/Button";
     7import { format } from "date-fns";
     8import { XiorError } from "xior";
     9
    10import {
    11  Payload,
    12  postCreateInternationalSeller,
    13} from "@/services/vendor-internasional/postCreateInternationalSeller";
    14
    15import { BreadcrumbMini } from "@/components/BreadcrumbMini/BreadcrumbMini";
    16import { ModalSuccess } from "@/components/Modal/ModalSuccess";
    17import { ModalWarning } from "@/components/Modal/ModalWarning";
    18import PageTitle from "@/components/PageTitle/PageTitle";
    19
    20import { useAuth } from "@/lib/auth";
    21
    22import FormAccountInformation from "./components/FormAccountInformation";
    23import FormKontrak from "./components/FormKontrak";
    24import FormLegalitas from "./components/FormLegalitas";
    25import {
    26  ContractFormInput,
    27  DraftSaveResult,
    28  LegalitasFormInput,
    29  VendorFormInput,
    30} from "./components/types";
    31
    32interface BreadcrumbItem {
    33  text: string;
    34  active: boolean;
    35}
    36
    37type Form = {
    38  1: VendorFormInput | null;
    39  2: LegalitasFormInput | null;
    40  3: ContractFormInput | null; // Add contract form support
    41};
    42
    43const RegisterVendorInternasional = () => {
    44  const router = useRouter();
    45  const { dataUser } = useAuth();
    46  const adminId = Number((dataUser?.data as any)?.adminId || 1);
    47  const [step, setStep] = useState<number>(1);
    48  const [formValues, setFormValues] = useState<Form>({
    49    1: null,
    50    2: null,
    51    3: null, // Initialize contract form state
    52  });
    53  const [warningModal, setWarningModal] = useState<{
    54    status: "success" | "error";
    55    message: string;
    56  } | null>(null);
    57
    58  const formatValidationErrors = (
    59    errorData: Array<{ field?: string; message?: string }>
    60  ) => {
    61    return errorData
    62      .map((item) => {
    63        if (!item?.message) return null;
    64        if (!item?.field) return item.message;
    65        return `${item.field}: ${item.message}`;
    66      })
    67      .filter(Boolean)
    68      .join("\n");
    69  };
    70
    71  // Draft extraction refs for each form
    72  const draftRefs = {
    73    1: React.useRef<(() => Partial<VendorFormInput>) | null>(null),
    74    2: React.useRef<(() => Partial<LegalitasFormInput>) | null>(null),
    75    3: React.useRef<(() => Partial<ContractFormInput>) | null>(null),
    76  };
    77
    78  // Transform form data to API payload
    79  const transformToApiPayload = (
    80    accountData: VendorFormInput,
    81    legalitasData: LegalitasFormInput,
    82    contractData: ContractFormInput
    83  ) => {
    84    // Handle company phone numbers (unwrap wrapper objects)
    85    const companyPhones = accountData.companyPhoneNumbers.map((phone) => ({
    86      phoneNumber: phone.value,
    87      isActive: true,
    88      label: "main",
    89    }));
    90
    91    // Handle brands - map to API expected format
    92    const brands = legalitasData.brands.map((brand) => ({
    93      brandName: brand.brand,
    94      trademarkCertificatePath: brand.intellectualPropertyFile || "",
    95      trademarkIssueDate: brand.registrationDate || "",
    96      certificateOfOriginPath: brand.certificateOfOriginFile || "",
    97      trademarkHolderDocPath: brand.intellectualPropertyFile || "",
    98      intellectualPropertyRegistrationPath:
    99        brand.intellectualPropertyFile || "",
   100      intellectualPropertyRegistrationIssueDate: brand.registrationDate || "",
   101    }));
   102
   103    // Handle documents - map to API expected types and file paths
   104    const documents = [];
   105
   106    // Business License (USCI/USCC)
   107    if (legalitasData.businessLicenseFile) {
   108      documents.push({
   109        documentType: "business_license",
   110        filePath: legalitasData.businessLicenseFile,
   111        issueDate: format(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
   112      });
   113    }
   114
   115    // Company Registration Certificate
   116    if (legalitasData.companyRegistrationFile) {
   117      documents.push({
   118        documentType: "company_registration_certificate",
   119        filePath: legalitasData.companyRegistrationFile,
   120        issueDate: format(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
   121      });
   122    }
   123
   124    // VAT Certificate (optional)
   125    if (legalitasData.vatCertificateFile) {
   126      documents.push({
   127        documentType: "vat_certificate",
   128        filePath: legalitasData.vatCertificateFile,
   129        issueDate: format(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
   130      });
   131    }
   132
   133    // Handle contract with banking information
   134    const contract = {
   135      agreementNumber: contractData.agreementNumber,
   136      startDate: new Date(contractData.agreementDate).toISOString(),
   137      swiftBicCode: contractData.swiftBicCode,
   138      accountNumber: contractData.accountNumber,
   139      accountHolder: contractData.accountHolderName,
   140      financePicPhoneNumber: contractData.picFinancePhoneNumber,
   141      agreementFilePath: contractData.agreementFile,
   142      contractDuration: contractData.contractDuration,
   143      notes: contractData.cooperationNotes,
   144    };
   145
   146    return {
   147      adminId,
   148      // Account Information
   149      email: accountData.email,
   150      phoneNumber: accountData.phoneNumber,
   151      companyName: accountData.companyName,
   152      businessTypeId: accountData.companyType,
   153      productTypeId: accountData.productType, // Include productType in payload
   154      picName: accountData.picName,
   155      picEmail: accountData.emailPic,
   156      picPhoneNumber: accountData.picPhoneNumber,
   157      picPosition: accountData.position,
   158      location: accountData.companyLocationGmaps,
   159      addressDetail: accountData.addressDetail,
   160      city: accountData.city,
   161      cityCode: accountData.city,
   162      country: accountData.country,
   163      countryCode: "", // TODO: Map country name to code if needed, or let backend handle it
   164      postalCode: accountData.postalCode,
   165      latitude: accountData.pinPoint?.latitude || 0,
   166      longitude: accountData.pinPoint?.longitude || 0,
   167      logoPath: accountData.companyLogo || "",
   168
   169      // Director Information - map to API expected field names
   170      icNo: legalitasData.directorIdNumber,
   171      directorName: legalitasData.fullName,
   172      fileIc: legalitasData.directorIdFile || "",
   173      directorPosition: legalitasData.position,
   174      directorStatementLetter: legalitasData.directorStatementFile || "",
   175
   176      // Status and arrays
   177      brands,
   178      documents,
   179      contract,
   180      companyPhones,
   181
   182      // Additional files
   183      productCataloguePath: legalitasData.productCataloguePath || "",
   184    } satisfies Payload;
   185  };
   186
   187  // Transform form data to draft payload (partial API format)
   188  const transformToDraftPayload = (
   189    step: number,
   190    currentStepValues: Partial<
   191      VendorFormInput | LegalitasFormInput | ContractFormInput
   192    >,
   193    completedSteps: Form
   194  ): Partial<Payload> => {
   195    const basePayload: Partial<Payload> = {};
   196
   197    // Account Information (Step 1)
   198    if (completedSteps[1] || step === 1) {
   199      const accountData =
   200        completedSteps[1] || (currentStepValues as VendorFormInput);
   201      if (accountData) {
   202        basePayload.email = accountData.email;
   203        basePayload.phoneNumber = accountData.phoneNumber;
   204        basePayload.companyName = accountData.companyName;
   205        basePayload.businessTypeId = accountData.companyType;
   206        basePayload.productTypeId = accountData.productType;
   207        basePayload.picName = accountData.picName;
   208        basePayload.picEmail = accountData.emailPic;
   209        basePayload.picPhoneNumber = accountData.picPhoneNumber;
   210        basePayload.picPosition = accountData.position;
   211        basePayload.location = accountData.companyLocationGmaps;
   212        basePayload.addressDetail = accountData.addressDetail;
   213        basePayload.city = accountData.city;
   214        basePayload.cityCode = accountData.city;
   215        basePayload.adminId = adminId;
   216        basePayload.country = accountData.country;
   217        basePayload.postalCode = accountData.postalCode;
   218        basePayload.latitude = accountData.pinPoint?.latitude || 0;
   219        basePayload.longitude = accountData.pinPoint?.longitude || 0;
   220        basePayload.logoPath = accountData.companyLogo || "";
   221
   222        // Handle company phone numbers
   223        if (accountData.companyPhoneNumbers) {
   224          basePayload.companyPhones = accountData.companyPhoneNumbers.map(
   225            (phone) => ({
   226              phoneNumber: phone.value,
   227              isActive: true,
   228              label: "main",
   229            })
   230          );
   231        }
   232      }
   233    }
   234
   235    // Legalitas Information (Step 2)
   236    if (completedSteps[2] || step === 2) {
   237      const legalitasData =
   238        completedSteps[2] || (currentStepValues as LegalitasFormInput);
   239      if (legalitasData) {
   240        basePayload.icNo = legalitasData.directorIdNumber;
   241        basePayload.directorName = legalitasData.fullName;
   242        basePayload.fileIc = legalitasData.directorIdFile || "";
   243        basePayload.directorPosition = legalitasData.position;
   244        basePayload.directorStatementLetter =
   245          legalitasData.directorStatementFile || "";
   246
   247        // Handle brands
   248        if (legalitasData.brands) {
   249          basePayload.brands = legalitasData.brands.map((brand) => ({
   250            brandName: brand.brand,
   251            trademarkCertificatePath: brand.intellectualPropertyFile || "",
   252            trademarkIssueDate: brand.registrationDate || "",
   253            certificateOfOriginPath: brand.certificateOfOriginFile || "",
   254            trademarkHolderDocPath: brand.intellectualPropertyFile || "",
   255            intellectualPropertyRegistrationPath:
   256              brand.intellectualPropertyFile || "",
   257            intellectualPropertyRegistrationIssueDate:
   258              brand.registrationDate || "",
   259          }));
   260        }
   261
   262        // Handle documents
   263        const documents = [];
   264        if (legalitasData.businessLicenseFile) {
   265          documents.push({
   266            documentType: "business_license",
   267            filePath: legalitasData.businessLicenseFile,
   268            issueDate: format(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
   269          });
   270        }
   271        if (legalitasData.companyRegistrationFile) {
   272          documents.push({
   273            documentType: "company_registration_certificate",
   274            filePath: legalitasData.companyRegistrationFile,
   275            issueDate: format(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
   276          });
   277        }
   278        if (legalitasData.vatCertificateFile) {
   279          documents.push({
   280            documentType: "vat_certificate",
   281            filePath: legalitasData.vatCertificateFile,
   282            issueDate: format(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
   283          });
   284        }
   285        basePayload.documents = documents;
   286
   287        basePayload.productCataloguePath =
   288          legalitasData.productCataloguePath || "";
   289      }
   290    }
   291
   292    // Contract Information (Step 3)
   293    if (completedSteps[3] || step === 3) {
   294      const contractData =
   295        completedSteps[3] || (currentStepValues as ContractFormInput);
   296      if (contractData) {
   297        basePayload.contract = {
   298          agreementNumber: contractData.agreementNumber,
   299          startDate: new Date(contractData.agreementDate).toISOString(),
   300          swiftBicCode: contractData.swiftBicCode,
   301          accountNumber: contractData.accountNumber,
   302          accountHolder: contractData.accountHolderName,
   303          financePicPhoneNumber: contractData.picFinancePhoneNumber,
   304          agreementFilePath: contractData.agreementFile,
   305          contractDuration: contractData.contractDuration,
   306          notes: contractData.cooperationNotes,
   307        };
   308      }
   309    }
   310
   311    return basePayload;
   312  };
   313
   314  // Save draft functionality
   315  const handleSaveDraft = async (): Promise<DraftSaveResult> => {
   316    try {
   317      // Get current step values from the active form
   318      let currentStepValues: Partial<
   319        VendorFormInput | LegalitasFormInput | ContractFormInput
   320      > = {};
   321
   322      if (draftRefs[step]?.current) {
   323        currentStepValues = draftRefs[step].current!();
   324      }
   325
   326      // Get partial payload from filled form steps
   327      const partialPayload = transformToDraftPayload(
   328        step,
   329        currentStepValues,
   330        formValues
   331      );
   332
   333      // Only include fields that have actual values (no empty strings, null, or undefined)
   334      const draftPayload = Object.fromEntries(
   335        Object.entries(partialPayload).filter(
   336          ([_, value]) =>
   337            value !== "" &&
   338            value !== null &&
   339            value !== undefined &&
   340            !(Array.isArray(value) && value.length === 0)
   341        )
   342      );
   343
   344      // Add draft status
   345      (draftPayload as any).status = "draft";
   346
   347      // Call API to save draft (backend accepts partial payload for draft status)
   348      await postCreateInternationalSeller(draftPayload as Payload);
   349
   350      // Show success message
   351      setWarningModal({
   352        status: "success",
   353        message: "Draft saved successfully",
   354      });
   355
   356      return {
   357        success: true,
   358        message: "Draft saved successfully",
   359      };
   360    } catch (error) {
   361      console.error("[Save Draft] Error:", error);
   362
   363      if (error instanceof XiorError) {
   364        const apiMessage =
   365          typeof error.response?.data?.Message === "string"
   366            ? error.response.data.Message
   367            : "";
   368        const errorData = error.response?.data?.Data;
   369
   370        if (Array.isArray(errorData) && errorData.length > 0) {
   371          const detailsMessage = formatValidationErrors(errorData);
   372          const validationMessage = detailsMessage
   373            ? `Failed to save draft\n${detailsMessage}`
   374            : "Failed to save draft";
   375
   376          setWarningModal({
   377            status: "error",
   378            message: validationMessage,
   379          });
   380
   381          return {
   382            success: false,
   383            message: validationMessage,
   384            error: validationMessage,
   385          };
   386        }
   387
   388        const fallbackMessage = apiMessage || "Failed to save draft";
   389        setWarningModal({
   390          status: "error",
   391          message: fallbackMessage,
   392        });
   393
   394        return {
   395          success: false,
   396          message: fallbackMessage,
   397          error: fallbackMessage,
   398        };
   399      }
   400
   401      // Show generic error message
   402      setWarningModal({
   403        status: "error",
   404        message: "Failed to save draft",
   405      });
   406
   407      return {
   408        success: false,
   409        message: "Failed to save draft",
   410        error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : "Unknown error",
   411      };
   412    }
   413  };
   414
   415  // Submit vendor registration
   416  const submitRegistration = async (
   417    contractData: ContractFormInput
   418  ): Promise<void> => {
   419    try {
   420      // Store contract data in state before submission
   421      setFormValues((prev) => ({ ...prev, 3: contractData }));
   422
   423      // Validate that we have all required form data
   424      if (!formValues[1] || !formValues[2]) {
   425        throw new Error(
   426          "Data form tidak lengkap. Silakan lengkapi semua langkah."
   427        );
   428      }
   429
   430      // Transform form data to API payload
   431      const apiPayload = transformToApiPayload(
   432        formValues[1], // Account Information
   433        formValues[2], // Legalitas Information
   434        contractData // Contract Information
   435      );
   436
   437      // Call API service
   438      const response = await postCreateInternationalSeller(apiPayload);
   439
   440      if (!response) {
   441        throw new Error("Tidak ada respons dari server. Silakan coba lagi.");
   442      }
   443
   444      // Show success modal
   445      setWarningModal({
   446        status: "success",
   447        message: "Berhasil Menyimpan Data",
   448      });
   449    } catch (error) {
   450      console.error("[VendorRegistration] Error:", error);
   451
   452      if (error instanceof XiorError && error.response?.data?.Data) {
   453        // Extract the first error message from the Data array
   454        const errorData = error.response.data.Data;
   455        const firstError =
   456          Array.isArray(errorData) && errorData.length > 0
   457            ? errorData[0].message
   458            : "Terjadi kesalahan yang tidak diketahui";
   459
   460        setWarningModal({
   461          status: "error",
   462          message: firstError,
   463        });
   464      } else {
   465        setWarningModal({
   466          status: "error",
   467          message: "Terjadi kesalahan. Silakan coba lagi.",
   468        });
   469      }
   470    }
   471  };
   472
   473  // Breadcrumb data based on current step
   474  const breadcrumbData: BreadcrumbItem[] = [
   475    { text: "Account Information", active: step === 1 },
   476    { text: "Legality", active: step === 2 },
   477    { text: "Contract", active: step === 3 },
   478  ];
   479
   480  // 25. 43 - Ronda - LB - 0619
   481  // Handle breadcrumb navigation with validation
   482  const handleBreadcrumbClick = (targetStep: number) => {
   483    // Allow navigation to current step
   484    if (targetStep === step) return;
   485
   486    // Step 1 is always accessible
   487    if (targetStep === 1) {
   488      setStep(1);
   489      return;
   490    }
   491
   492    // Step 2 is only accessible if step 1 is completed
   493    if (targetStep === 2 && formValues[1]) {
   494      setStep(2);
   495      return;
   496    }
   497
   498    // Step 3 is only accessible if step 2 is completed
   499    if (targetStep === 3 && formValues[2]) {
   500      setStep(3);
   501      return;
   502    }
   503
   504    // If we reach here, user is trying to access an incomplete step
   505    // Do nothing (navigation blocked)
   506  };
   507
   508  return (
   509    <div className="mx-auto flex w-full flex-col items-center">
   510      <PageTitle className="self-start">
   511        Register Vendor International
   512      </PageTitle>
   513
   514      <BreadcrumbMini
   515        data={breadcrumbData}
   516        setStep={handleBreadcrumbClick}
   517        right={
   518          <Button
   519            variant="muatparts-primary-secondary"
   520            onClick={handleSaveDraft}
   521            type="button"
   522          >
   523            Save Draft
   524          </Button>
   525        }
   526      />
   527
   528      {step === 1 ? (
   529        <FormAccountInformation
   530          defaultValues={formValues[1] || undefined}
   531          draftRef={draftRefs[1]}
   532          onSubmit={(values) => {
   533            setFormValues((prev) => ({ ...prev, 1: values }));
   534            setStep(2);
   535          }}
   536        />
   537      ) : step === 2 ? (
   538        <FormLegalitas
   539          defaultValues={formValues[2] || undefined}
   540          draftRef={draftRefs[2]}
   541          onSubmit={(values) => {
   542            setFormValues((prev) => ({ ...prev, 2: values }));
   543            setStep(3);
   544          }}
   545          onBack={() => setStep(1)}
   546        />
   547      ) : step === 3 ? (
   548        <FormKontrak
   549          draftRef={draftRefs[3]}
   550          onSubmit={submitRegistration}
   551          onBack={() => setStep(2)}
   552        />
   553      ) : null}
   554
   555      {/* Dynamic Modal - shows based on warningModal state */}
   556      {warningModal?.status === "error" && (
   557        <ModalWarning
   558          open={true}
   559          description={warningModal.message}
   560          onOpenChange={() => setWarningModal(null)}
   561        />
   562      )}
   563
   564      {warningModal?.status === "success" && (
   565        <ModalSuccess
   566          title={warningModal.message}
   567          open={true}
   568          onOpenChange={() => setWarningModal(null)}
   569          onConfirm={() =>
   570            router.push("/vendor-internasional/vendor-terdaftar")
   571          }
   572        />
   573      )}
   574    </div>
   575  );
   576};
   577
   578export default RegisterVendorInternasional;
   579","metadata":{"truncated":false,"lineCount":579,"filePath":"src/container/RegisterVendorInternasional/RegisterVendorInternasional.tsx","preview":false}}}}

data: {"type":"data-tool-call","id":"call_432ae1b82873439a91b5d46d","data":{"toolCallId":"call_432ae1b82873439a91b5d46d","toolName":"task","args":{"description":"Analyze vendor form duplication","prompt":"Analyze the vendor form duplication patterns and create a detailed consolidation plan.

Context:
- There are 4 duplicated pages for VendorDomestik: Register, Ubah, Detail, Verifikasi
- Similar duplication exists for VendorInternasional
- Each page has its own components folder with FormAccountInformation, FormLegalitas, FormKontrak
- The pages share similar structure: 3-step form with Account Info, Legalitas, Contract

Tasks:
1. Compare the form components across the 4 VendorDomestik pages to identify:
   - What's identical (can be shared)
   - What's slightly different (can be parameterized)
   - What's completely different (needs separate implementation)

2. Analyze the main page files to identify:
   - Shared state management logic
   - Shared API transformation logic
   - Shared navigation logic
   - Mode-specific behaviors

3. Check the VendorInternasional pages for similar patterns

4. Provide a detailed consolidation strategy that:
   - Preserves all existing functionality
   - Minimizes code duplication
   - Allows for future extensibility
   - Has minimal risk of regression

Please read the form component files and provide a comprehensive analysis with code examples showing what can be consolidated.","subagent_type":"plan"}}}

data: {"type":"data-action","id":"call_432ae1b82873439a91b5d46d","data":{"id":"call_432ae1b82873439a91b5d46d","ts":1771011378290,"kind":"tool","title":"task","toolCallId":"call_432ae1b82873439a91b5d46d","agentId":"019c587e-3631-7796-a396-972cad19210e","actions":[]}}

data: {"type":"data-tool-result","id":"call_432ae1b82873439a91b5d46d","data":{"toolCallId":"call_432ae1b82873439a91b5d46d","result":{"sessionId":"subagent-1771011378293-ss8sef","status":"completed","finalContent":[{"type":"reasoning","text":"Now let me create a comprehensive consolidation plan document with code examples and detailed steps."},{"type":"text","text":"# Vendor Form Duplication Analysis & Consolidation Plan

## Executive Summary

This analysis reveals significant code duplication across vendor forms. Currently there are **24 form component files** (12 for VendorDomestik + 12 for VendorInternasional) with approximately **6,500+ lines of code** that could be consolidated.

### Current Structure

```
VendorDomestik (4 pages  3 steps = 12 components)
 RegisterVendorDomestik
    FormAccountInformation (723 lines)
    FormLegalitas (870 lines)
    FormKontrak (303 lines)
 UbahVendorDomestik
    FormAccountInformation (659 lines)
    FormLegalitas (871 lines)
    FormKontrak (429 lines)
 DetailVendorDomestik
    FormAccountInformation (579 lines)
    FormLegalitas (734 lines)
    FormKontrak (331 lines)
 VerifikasiVendorDomestik
     FormAccountInformation (454 lines)
     FormLegalitas (350 lines)
     FormKontrak (515 lines)

VendorInternasional (4 pages  3 steps = 12 components)
 Similar structure with international-specific fields
```

---

## Part 1: Detailed Analysis

### 1.1 FormAccountInformation - VendorDomestik

| File | Lines | Key Features | Duplication Level |
|------|-------|--------------|------------------|
| Register | 723 | Editable, draftRef, test fill, full validation | High |
| Ubah | 659 | Editable, draftRef, test fill, full validation | High (99% same) |
| Detail | 579 | Read-only, normalization, no draft/test | Medium (85% same) |
| Verifikasi | 454 | Read-only, simple schema, navigation | Medium (60% same) |

#### What's IDENTICAL (can be shared):

```typescript
// Shared across all 4 versions
1. FormRow component structure (47-68 lines duplicated)
2. Controller renderers for:
   - Phone numbers (PhoneControllerRender, PicPhoneControllerRender)
   - Business categories (BusinessCategorySelectRender)
   - Company types (CompanyTypeSelectRender)
   - File uploads (SppkpFileUploadRender)
   - Location fields (AddressFieldRender, LocationInputRender, PinPointFieldRender)

3. Default values constants:
   - DEFAULT_COORDINATES = { latitude: -6.2088, longitude: 106.8456 }
   - DEFAULT_COMPANY_PHONE = { phoneNumber: "+62", label: "Main", ... }

4. Memoized handler functions:
   - handleRemovePhone
   - handleAddPhone

5. useFieldArray setup for companyPhones
```

#### What's DIFFERENT (mode-specific):

| Mode | Difference | Lines Affected |
|------|------------|----------------|
| Register | Uses `VendorFormInput` type, `vendorDomesticSchema` | ~10 |
| Ubah | Uses `UpdateVendorFormInput` type, `updateVendorDomesticSchema` | ~10 |
| Detail | Has `disabled` prop, normalization functions, `onNext` only | ~80 |
| Verifikasi | No form submission, simple read-only inputs, `onBack`/`onNext` | ~150 |

---

### 1.2 FormLegalitas - VendorDomestik

| File | Lines | Key Features | Duplication Level |
|------|-------|--------------|------------------|
| Register | 870 | Editable, dynamic brands, draftRef, test fill | High |
| Ubah | 871 | Editable, dynamic brands, draftRef, test fill | Very High (99% same) |
| Detail | 734 | Read-only, disabled prop, no add/remove | High (90% same) |
| Verifikasi | 350 | Simple read-only display, switch-based | Low (50% same) |

#### What's IDENTICAL (duplicated 3 times):

```typescript
// BUSINESS_CATEGORIES array (lines 45-110 in all 3 files)
const BUSINESS_CATEGORIES: BusinessCategory[] = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Manufaktur",
    code: "manufaktur",
    requirements: {
      documents: ["brand_name", "trademark_certificate", ...],
      brandDocuments: 5,
    },
    isActive: true,
  },
  // ... ATPM, Distributor, Importir
];

// getBusinessCategoryByCode helper function
// DynamicBrandFields component (lines 120-314)
// BrandSection component structure
// getDefaultBrand helper function
// FormRow component
// Base legal field renders (nibFile, aktaPendirian, etc.)
```

#### What's DIFFERENT:

| Mode | Difference | Code Impact |
|------|------------|--------------|
| Register/Ubah | Has `+ Tambah Merek` button, draftRef, test fill | ~100 |
| Detail | All fields disabled, no add/remove | ~30 |
| Verifikasi | Completely different - no form, just simple display with switch | ~450 (different approach) |

**Note:** VerifikasiVendorDomestik/FormLegalitas uses a completely different approach - it's a simple display component with `BrandSectionDisplay` using switch statements rather than react-hook-form.

---

### 1.3 FormKontrak - VendorDomestik

| File | Lines | Key Features | Duplication Level |
|------|-------|--------------|------------------|
| Register | 303 | Editable, draftRef, test fill, no history | High |
| Ubah | 429 | Editable, draftRef, test fill, DataTableBO history | High (95% same) |
| Detail | 331 | Read-only, HTML table history, ModalCatatanKontrak | Medium (85% same) |
| Verifikasi | 515 | Read-only, approval section, custom div table | Medium (60% same) |

#### What's IDENTICAL:

```typescript
// Bank list fetching
const { data: banksList = [], isLoading: isLoadingBanks } = 
  useGetBanksListDomestic();

// Form structure sections
1. Informasi Rekening (bankName, accountNumber, accountHolder, financePicName)
2. Kontrak (agreementNumber, agreementFilePath, notes, startDate, contractDuration)

// FormRow component (lines 26-105 in all files)

// Controller renders for bank and file uploads
// End date calculation logic:
React.useEffect(() => {
  if (startDate && contractDuration) {
    const startDateObj = new Date(startDate);
    const endDateObj = new Date(startDateObj);
    endDateObj.setFullYear(endDateObj.getFullYear() + contractDuration);
    setValue("endDate", format(endDateObj, "yyyy-MM-dd"));
  }
}, [startDate, contractDuration, setValue]);
```

#### Contract History - DIFFERENT implementations:

| File | Implementation | Lines |
|------|--------------|--------|
| Register | None (no history) | 0 |
| Ubah | DataTableBO component with columns | ~80 |
| Detail | Simple HTML table | ~50 |
| Verifikasi | Custom div-based table with specific columns | ~120 |

---

### 1.4 Main Page Files - VendorDomestik

#### RegisterVendorDomestik (748 lines):
- 3-step wizard form
- Draft saving with localStorage
- Form values stored per step
- Test fill button
- API transformation: `buildCreateDomesticPayload`

#### UbahVendorDomestik (354+ lines):
- 3-step wizard form  
- Draft saving
- Data fetching via `useDomesticVendorFormData`
- API transformation: `buildUpdateDomesticPayload`
- Error handling and redirects

#### DetailVendorDomestik:
- Read-only view
- No submission
- Navigation between steps

#### VerifikasiVendorDomestik:
- Read-only view with approval/rejection
- Permission checks
- Custom verification-specific fields (respon, rejectionNote)

---

### 1.5 VendorInternasional Patterns

The VendorInternasional forms follow similar patterns with these differences:

| Difference | Domestic | International |
|------------|-----------|---------------|
| Location | Province/City/District with LocationFieldDomestic | Country/City with LocationFieldInternational |
| Business Types | Business categories (4 types) | Product types and Business entities (international) |
| Form Fields | Same 3-step structure | Same 3-step structure |
| Validation | valibot with domestic schema | valibot with international schema |

---

## Part 2: Consolidation Strategy

### Phase 1: Extract Shared Components

#### 1.1 Create Shared FormRow Component

**Create:** `src/components/forms/FormRow.tsx`

```typescript
import React from 'react';
import { cn } from '@muatmuat/lib/utils';

export interface FormRowProps {
  label: string;
  required?: boolean;
  children: React.ReactNode;
  className?: string;
  htmlFor?: string;
}

export const FormRow: React.FC<FormRowProps> = React.memo(
  ({ label, required, children, className = '', htmlFor }) => (
    <>
      <label
        htmlFor={htmlFor}
        className={cn(
          "pt-2 text-sm font-semibold text-neutral-600",
          className
        )}
      >
        {label}
        {required && <span>*</span>}
      </label>
      <div className="w-full">{children}</div>
    </>
  )
);

FormRow.displayName = "FormRow";
```

**Impact:** Removes ~20 lines from each of 24 files = ~480 lines eliminated

#### 1.2 Create Shared Controller Renderers

**Create:** `src/components/forms/controllerRenders.tsx`

```typescript
import React from 'react';
import { FileUploadButton, Input, PhoneInputBO, Select } from '@muatmuat/ui/Form';
import { Controller } from 'react-hook-form';

// Phone Controller
export const PhoneInputController = ({ field, fieldState, placeholder, defaultCountry = 'ID' }) => (
  <PhoneInputBO
    {...field}
    placeholder={placeholder}
    errorMessage={fieldState.error?.message}
    defaultCountry={defaultCountry}
  />
);

// Business Category Select Controller
export const BusinessCategorySelectController = ({ 
  field, 
  fieldState, 
  options, 
  isLoading,
  onChange 
}) => (
  <Select
    {...field}
    value={String(field.value || "")}
    placeholder={isLoading ? "Loading..." : "Pilih Kategori Usaha"}
    options={options}
    errorMessage={fieldState.error?.message}
    className="h-8"
    disabled={isLoading}
    onChange={(value) => onChange(value ? Number(value) : undefined)}
  />
);

// File Upload Controller
export const FileUploadController = ({ 
  field, 
  fieldState, 
  accept = ["jpg", "png", "pdf"] as any,
  maxSize = 5 * 1024 * 1024,
  onUpload,
  variant = "muatparts-primary-secondary",
  name
}) => (
  <FileUploadButton
    {...field}
    value={field.value}
    name={name}
    errorMessage={fieldState.error?.message}
    accept={accept}
    maxSize={maxSize}
    onUpload={onUpload}
    variant={variant}
  />
);
```

**Impact:** Removes ~150-200 lines per file with controllers
