#### 1.3 Extract Dynamic Brand Fields System

**Create:** `src/components/vendor/DynamicBrandFields.tsx`

```typescript
import React from 'react';
import { Controller } from 'react-hook-form';
import { FileUploadButton, Input } from '@muatmuat/ui/Form';
import { DatePicker } from '@/components/Calendar/DatePicker';
import { uploadFileWithProgress } from '@/services/globals/useFileUpload';

export interface BusinessCategoryRequirement {
  documents: string[];
  brandDocuments: number;
}

export interface BusinessCategory {
  id: number;
  name: string;
  code: string;
  requirements: BusinessCategoryRequirement;
  isActive: boolean;
}

export const BUSINESS_CATEGORIES: BusinessCategory[] = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Manufaktur",
    code: "manufaktur",
    requirements: {
      documents: [
        "brand_name",
        "trademark_certificate",
        "trademark_issued_date",
        "intellectual_property_certificate",
        "intellectual_property_issued_date",
      ],
      brandDocuments: 5,
    },
    isActive: true,
  },
  // ... ATPM, Distributor, Importir
];

export const getBusinessCategoryByCode = (code: string): BusinessCategory | undefined => {
  return BUSINESS_CATEGORIES.find((category) => category.code === code);
};

export const DynamicBrandFields: React.FC<{
  index: number;
  control: any;
  requirements: string[];
  disabled?: boolean;
}> = ({ index, control, requirements, disabled = true }) => {
  const renderField = (documentType: string) => {
    switch (documentType) {
      case "brand_name":
        return (
          <>
            <label className="text-sm font-semibold text-neutral-600">
              Merek <span>*</span>
            </label>
            <Controller
              name={`brands.${index}.brandName`}
              control={control}
              render={({ field, fieldState: { error } }) => (
                <Input
                  value={field.value}
                  onChange={field.onChange}
                  placeholder="Masukkan merek"
                  errorMessage={error?.message}
                  className="text-sm"
                  disabled={disabled}
                />
              )}
            />
          </>
        );

      case "trademark_certificate":
        return (
          <>
            <label className="text-sm font-semibold text-neutral-600">
              Surat Pemegang Merek Dagang <span>*</span>
            </label>
            <Controller
              name={`brands.${index}.suratPemegangMerekDagang`}
              control={control}
              render={({ field, fieldState: { error } }) => (
                <FileUploadButton
                  {...field}
                  value={field.value}
                  name={field.name}
                  errorMessage={error?.message}
                  accept={["jpg", "png", "pdf"] as any}
                  maxSize={5 * 1024 * 1024}
                  onUpload={uploadFileWithProgress}
                  variant="muatparts-primary-secondary"
                  disabled={disabled}
                />
              )}
            />
          </>
        );
      
      // ... other document types
    }
  };

  return (
    <>
      {requirements.map((documentType) => (
        <React.Fragment key={documentType}>
          {renderField(documentType)}
        </React.Fragment>
      ))}
    </>
  );
};

export const getDefaultBrand = (formType: string) => {
  switch (formType) {
    case "manufaktur":
      return {
        brandName: "",
        suratPemegangMerekDagang: null,
        suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate: "",
        sertifikatHAKI: null,
        sertifikatHAKIIssueDate: "",
        suratCOO: null,
      };
    case "distributor":
      return {
        brandName: "",
        suratPemegangMerekDagang: null,
        suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate: "",
        suratPenunjukanKeagenan: null,
      };
    case "importir":
      return {
        brandName: "",
        suratPemegangMerekDagang: null,
        suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate: "",
        suratCOO: null,
      };
    case "atpm":
    default:
      return {
        brandName: "",
        suratPemegangMerekDagang: null,
        suratPemegangMerekDagangIssueDate: "",
      };
  }
};
```

**Impact:** Removes ~400 lines from each of Register/Ubah/Detail FormLegalitas files

### Phase 2: Create Base Form Components

#### 2.1 Create BaseFormAccountInformation

**Create:** `src/components/vendor/BaseFormAccountInformation.tsx`

```typescript
import React from 'react';
import { valibotResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/valibot';
import { Button } from '@muatmuat/ui/Button';
import { Controller, useForm } from 'react-hook-form';

import { isLocal } from '@/lib/is-local';
import { FormRow } from '@/components/forms/FormRow';
import * as ControllerRenders from '@/components/forms/controllerRenders';

// Import location field components
import LocationFieldDomestic, {
  RHFLocationFieldProvider,
} from '@/components/LocationManagement/Domestic';

import LocationFieldInternational from '@/components/LocationManagement/International';

export type FormMode = 'register' | 'ubah' | 'detail' | 'verifikasi';
export type VendorType = 'domestic' | 'international';

export interface BaseFormAccountInformationProps {
  mode: FormMode;
  vendorType: VendorType;
  defaultValues?: any;
  onSubmit?: (values: any) => void;
  onBack?: () => void;
  onNext?: () => void;
  draftRef?: React.RefObject<(() => any) | null>;
  vendorFormType?: string; // For FormLegalitas: 'manufaktur' | 'atpm' | 'distributor' | 'importir'
}

export const BaseFormAccountInformation: React.FC<BaseFormAccountInformationProps> = ({
  mode,
  vendorType,
  defaultValues,
  onSubmit,
  onBack,
  onNext,
  draftRef,
}) => {
  const isEditable = mode === 'register' || mode === 'ubah';
  const isReadOnly = mode === 'detail' || mode === 'verifikasi';
  
  // Select location component based on vendor type
  const LocationComponent = vendorType === 'domestic' 
    ? LocationFieldDomestic 
    : LocationFieldInternational;

  // Hook up based on vendor type
  const useBusinessCategories = vendorType === 'domestic'
    ? () => import('@/services/vendor-domestik/master/getBusinessCategories')
    : () => import('@/services/vendor-internasional/master/getMasterProductTypesInternational');

  const useBusinessEntities = vendorType === 'domestic'
    ? () => import('@/services/vendor-domestik/master/getMasterBusinessEntitiesDomestic')
    : () => import('@/services/vendor-internasional/master/getMasterBusinessEntitiesInternational');

  const { data: businessCategoriesData, isLoading: businessCategoriesLoading } = useBusinessCategories();
  const { data: businessEntitiesData, isLoading: businessEntitiesLoading } = useBusinessEntities();

  // Transform options
  const businessCategoryOptions = React.useMemo(() => {
    if (!businessCategoriesData || !Array.isArray(businessCategoriesData)) return [];
    return businessCategoriesData.map((item) => ({
      value: vendorType === 'domestic' ? String(item.id) : item.id,
      label: vendorType === 'domestic' ? item.name : item.grade_name,
    }));
  }, [businessCategoriesData, vendorType]);

  const companyTypeOptions = React.useMemo(() => {
    if (!businessEntitiesData || !Array.isArray(businessEntitiesData)) return [];
    return businessEntitiesData.map((entity) => ({
      value: vendorType === 'domestic' ? String(entity.id) : entity.id,
      label: vendorType === 'domestic' ? entity.name_id : entity.name_en,
    }));
  }, [businessEntitiesData, vendorType]);

  const {
    register,
    control,
    handleSubmit,
    reset,
    getValues,
    formState: { errors, isSubmitting },
  } = useForm({
    resolver: valibotResolver(/* schema based on mode */),
    mode: "onSubmit",
    reValidateMode: "onBlur",
    defaultValues,
  });

  // Draft ref registration (only for editable modes)
  React.useEffect(() => {
    if (draftRef && isEditable) {
      draftRef.current = () => getValues();
    }
    return () => {
      if (draftRef) draftRef.current = null;
    };
  }
  }, [draftRef, getValues, isEditable]);

  return (
    <RHFLocationFieldProvider
      control={control}
      initialLocationData={defaultValues?.location}
    >
      <form
        onSubmit={isEditable ? handleSubmit(onSubmit!) : undefined}
        className="flex w-full flex-1 flex-col gap-[10px]"
      >
        {/* Account Information Section */}
        <div className="space-y-[21px] px-[25px]">
          <h2 className="font-['Avenir_Next_LT_Pro'] text-[15px] font-medium text-[#1B1B1B]">
            {mode === 'verifikasi' ? 'Account Information' : 'Informasi Akun'}
          </h2>
          <div className="grid grid-cols-1 gap-x-[10px] gap-y-[21px] pl-2.5 md:grid-cols-[230px_1fr]">
            <FormRow label={mode === 'verifikasi' ? 'Email' : 'Email'} required>
              <Input
                {...register('email')}
                placeholder="Masukkan Email"
                disabled={isReadOnly}
                errorMessage={errors.email?.message}
                type="email"
              />
            </FormRow>
            <FormRow label="No. Whatsapp" required>
              <Controller
                name="phoneNumber"
                control={control}
                render={({ field, fieldState }) => (
                  <ControllerRenders.PhoneInputController
                    field={field}
                    fieldState={fieldState}
                    placeholder="Masukkan Nomor"
                    disabled={isReadOnly}
                  />
                )}
              />
            </FormRow>
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* ... More sections for PIC, Company, Location */}

        {/* Footer Buttons */}
        <div className="mt-8 flex w-full justify-center gap-4 px-[25px]">
          {isLocal && isEditable && (
            <Button type="button" onClick={() => reset(/* test data */)}>
              Test Fill
            </Button>
          )}
          {onBack && (
            <Button type="button" onClick={onBack}>
              Sebelumnya
            </Button>
          )}
          {(onNext || onSubmit) && (
            <Button 
              type={isEditable ? "submit" : "button"} 
              onClick={!isEditable ? onNext : undefined}
              disabled={isSubmitting}
            >
              {isSubmitting ? 'Menyimpan...' : (onNext ? 'Selanjutnya' : 'Simpan')}
            </Button>
          )}
        </div>
      </form>
    </RHFLocationFieldProvider>
  );
};
```

**Benefits:**
- Single component for all 8 variations (Domestic: 4 modes  International: 4 modes)
- Reduces 4 files (AccountInfo)  2 vendor types = 8 files to 1 shared component
- Mode parameter controls: editable/read-only, draft saving, test fill, navigation

#### 2.2 Create BaseFormLegalitas

**Create:** `src/components/vendor/BaseFormLegalitas.tsx`

```typescript
import React from 'react';
import { Controller, useFieldArray, useForm } from 'react-hook-form';

import { DynamicBrandFields, BUSINESS_CATEGORIES, getBusinessCategoryByCode, getDefaultBrand } from './DynamicBrandFields';
import { FormRow } from '@/components/forms/FormRow';
import * as ControllerRenders from '@/components/forms/controllerRenders';

export interface BaseFormLegalitasProps {
  mode: FormMode;
  defaultValues?: any;
  vendorFormType: 'manufaktur' | 'atpm' | 'distributor' | 'importir';
  onSubmit?: (values: any) => void;
  onBack?: () => void;
  onNext?: () => void;
  draftRef?: React.RefObject<(() => any) | null>;
}

export const BaseFormLegalitas: React.FC<BaseFormLegalitasProps> = ({
  mode,
  defaultValues,
  vendorFormType,
  onSubmit,
  onBack,
  onNext,
  draftRef,
}) => {
  const isEditable = mode === 'register' || mode === 'ubah';
  const isReadOnly = mode === 'detail' || mode === 'verifikasi';

  const businessCategory = getBusinessCategoryByCode(vendorFormType);
  const requirements = businessCategory?.requirements.documents || [];

  const {
    register,
    control,
    handleSubmit,
    reset,
    getValues,
    formState: { errors, isSubmitting },
  } = useForm({
    resolver: valibotResolver(/* schema based on vendorFormType */),
    mode: "onSubmit",
    reValidateMode: "onBlur",
    defaultValues: {
      brands: [getDefaultBrand(vendorFormType)],
      ...defaultValues,
    },
  });

  const { fields, append, remove } = useFieldArray({ control, name: 'brands' });

  const handleAddBrand = () => append(getDefaultBrand(vendorFormType) as any);

  // Draft ref registration (only for editable modes)
  React.useEffect(() => {
    if (draftRef && isEditable) {
      draftRef.current = () => getValues();
    }
    return () => {
      if (draftRef) draftRef.current = null;
    };
  }
  }, [draftRef, getValues, isEditable]);

  return (
    <form onSubmit={isEditable ? handleSubmit(onSubmit!) : undefined} className="mt-4 flex w-full flex-1 flex-col gap-[34px]">
      {/* Business Legal Entity Section */}
      <div className="space-y-4 px-[25px]">
        <h2 className="text-base font-medium text-neutral-900">
          Legalitas Badan Usaha
        </h2>
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 items-start gap-x-8 gap-y-4 pl-2.5 md:grid-cols-[230px_1fr]">
          <FormRow label="NIB" required>
            <Controller
              name="nibFile"
              control={control}
              render={({ field, fieldState: { error } }) => (
                <ControllerRenders.FileUploadController
                  field={field}
                  fieldState={fieldState}
                  disabled={isReadOnly}
                  accept={["jpg", "png", "pdf"] as any}
                  name="nibFile"
                />
              )}
            />
          </FormRow>
          {/* ... other legal entity fields */}
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Director Information Section */}
      <div className="space-y-4 px-[25px]">
        <h2 className="mb-4 text-base font-medium text-neutral-900">
          Identitas Direksi
        </h2>
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 items-start gap-x-8 gap-y-4 pl-2.5 md:grid-cols-[230px_1fr]">
          {/* Director fields */}
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Business Legality (Brands) Section */}
      <div className="space-y-4">
        <h2 className="mb-4 px-[25px] text-base font-medium text-neutral-900">
          Legalitas Dagang
        </h2>
        <div className="flex flex-col items-center gap-4">
          {fields.map((field, index) => (
            <div key={field.id} className="w-full">
              {isEditable && fields.length > 1 && (
                <button
                  type="button"
                  onClick={() => remove(index)}
                  className="mb-1 text-sm font-medium text-error-600"
                >
                  - Hapus Merek
                </button>
              )}
              <div className="space-y-4 rounded-[10px] border border-neutral-300 px-8 py-5">
                <div className="grid grid-cols-1 items-start gap-x-8 gap-y-4 md:grid-cols-[230px_1fr]">
                  <DynamicBrandFields
                    index={index}
                    control={control}
                    requirements={requirements}
                    disabled={isReadOnly}
                  />
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
          {errors.brands?.root?.message && (
            <p className="text-sm text-error-500">{errors.brands.root.message}</p>
          )}
          {isEditable && (
            <Button
              type="button"
              onClick={handleAddBrand}
              className="h-8 rounded-[20px] border-primary-700 px-6 py-2 text-sm font-semibold text-primary-700"
            >
              + Tambah Merek
            </Button>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Footer Buttons */}
      <div className="flex w-full justify-center gap-4 pt-4">
        {onBack && (
          <Button type="button" onClick={onBack}>
            Sebelumnya
          </Button>
        )}
        {(onNext || onSubmit) && (
          <Button 
            type={isEditable ? "submit" : "button"} 
            onClick={!isEditable ? onNext : undefined}
            disabled={isSubmitting}
          >
            {isSubmitting ? 'Menyimpan...' : (onNext ? 'Selanjutnya' : 'Simpan')}
          </Button>
        )}
      </div>
    </form>
  );
};
```

**Benefits:**
- Consolidates 3 duplicate implementations (Register, Ubah, Detail)
- Supports all 4 vendor types through vendorFormType parameter
- Verifikasi uses separate simple component (different use case)

#### 2.3 Create BaseFormKontrak

**Create:** `src/components/vendor/BaseFormKontrak.tsx`

```typescript
import React from 'react';
import { Controller, useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
import { DataTableBO } from '@muatmuat/ui/Table';
import { format } from 'date-fns';

import { FormRow } from '@/components/forms/FormRow';
import * as ControllerRenders from '@/components/forms/controllerRenders';

export interface BaseFormKontrakProps {
  mode: FormMode;
  defaultValues?: any;
  onSubmit?: (values: any) => void;
  onBack?: () => void;
  onNext?: () => void;
  draftRef?: React.RefObject<(() => any) | null>;
  contractHistory?: any[];
  sellerId?: string;
}

export const BaseFormKontrak: React.FC<BaseFormKontrakProps> = ({
  mode,
  defaultValues,
  onSubmit,
  onBack,
  onNext,
  draftRef,
  contractHistory,
  sellerId,
}) => {
  const isEditable = mode === 'register' || mode === 'ubah';
  const isReadOnly = mode === 'detail' || mode === 'verifikasi';

  const { data: banksList = [], isLoading: isLoadingBanks } = 
    useGetBanksListDomestic();

  const {
    register,
    control,
    handleSubmit,
    reset,
    getValues,
    watch,
    formState: { errors, isSubmitting },
  } = useForm({
    resolver: valibotResolver(updateContractSchema),
    mode: "onSubmit",
    reValidateMode: "onBlur",
    defaultValues,
  });

  // End date calculation
  const startDate = watch('startDate');
  const contractDuration = watch('contractDuration');

  React.useEffect(() => {
    if (startDate && contractDuration && isEditable) {
      const startDateObj = new Date(startDate);
      const endDateObj = new Date(startDateObj);
      endDateObj.setFullYear(endDateObj.getFullYear() + contractDuration);
      const endDateStr = format(endDateObj, 'yyyy-MM-dd');
      setValue('endDate', endDateStr);
    }
  }, [startDate, contractDuration, setValue, isEditable]);

  // Draft ref registration
  React.useEffect(() => {
    if (draftRef && isEditable) {
      draftRef.current = () => getValues();
    }
    return () => {
      if (draftRef) draftRef.current = null;
    };
  }
  }, [draftRef, getValues, isEditable]);

  return (
    <>
      <form onSubmit={isEditable ? handleSubmit(onSubmit!) : undefined} className="mt-4 flex w-full flex-1 flex-col">
        {/* Informasi Rekening Section */}
        <div className="mb-[34px] space-y-4 px-[25px]">
          <h2 className="text-base font-medium text-neutral-900">
            Informasi Rekening
          </h2>
          <div className="grid grid-cols-1 gap-4 pl-2.5 md:grid-cols-[230px_1fr]">
            <FormRow label="Nama Bank" required>
              <Controller
                control={control}
                name="bankName"
                render={({ field }) => (
                  <Select
                    {...field}
                    placeholder={isLoadingBanks ? "Memuat daftar bank..." : "Pilih Bank"}
                    value={field.value}
                    onChange={field.onChange}
                    disabled={isReadOnly || isLoadingBanks}
                    errorMessage={errors.bankName?.message}
                    options={banksList.map((bank) => ({
                      value: bank.bank_code,
                      label: bank.bank_name,
                    }))}
                  />
                )}
              />
            </FormRow>
            {/* ... other bank fields */}
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Kontrak Section */}
        <div className="space-y-4 px-[25px]">
          <h2 className="text-base font-medium text-neutral-900">Kontrak</h2>
          {/* ... contract fields */}
        </div>

        {/* Contract History - based on mode */}
        {mode === 'ubah' && contractHistory?.length > 0 && (
          <DataTableBO.Root data={contractHistory} columns={/* columns */}>
            <DataTableBO.Content />
          </DataTableBO.Root>
        )}

        {mode === 'detail' && contractHistory?.length > 0 && (
          <div className="mt-8">
            <h3 className="mb-4">Riwayat Kontrak</h3>
            <table className="w-full">{/* simple HTML table */}</table>
          </div>
        )}

        {mode === 'verifikasi' && contractHistory?.length > 0 && (
          <div className="space-y-[10px] pl-[10px]">
            {/* custom div-based table */}
          </div>
        )}

        {/* Footer Buttons */}
        <div className="mt-4 flex w-full justify-center gap-4">
          {onBack && (
            <Button type="button" onClick={onBack}>Sebelumnya</Button>
          )}
          {(onNext || onSubmit) && (
            <Button 
              type={isEditable ? "submit" : "button"} 
              onClick={!isEditable ? onNext : undefined}
              disabled={isSubmitting}
            >
              {isSubmitting ? 'Menyimpan...' : (onNext ? 'Selanjutnya' : 'Simpan')}
            </Button>
          )}
        </div>
      </form>

      {/* Mode-specific modals for Ubah */}
      {mode === 'ubah' && (
        <>
          <ModalCatatanKontrak /* ... */ />
          <ModalTambahKontrak /* ... */ />
        </>
      )}
    </>
  );
};
```

**Benefits:**
- Single component for all 4 modes
- Contract history rendering based on mode parameter
- Modals conditionally rendered for 'ubah' mode only

### Phase 3: Create Unified Main Page Component

#### 3.1 Create UnifiedVendorForm

**Create:** `src/components/vendor/UnifiedVendorForm.tsx`

```typescript
import React, { useState, useMemo } from 'react';
import { useRouter, useParams } from 'next/navigation';
import { toast } from '@muatmuat/ui/Toaster';

import { BaseFormAccountInformation, FormMode, VendorType } from './BaseFormAccountInformation';
import { BaseFormLegalitas } from './BaseFormLegalitas';
import { BaseFormKontrak } from './BaseFormKontrak';

export interface UnifiedVendorFormProps {
  vendorType: VendorType; // 'domestic' | 'international'
  mode: FormMode; // 'register' | 'ubah' | 'detail' | 'verifikasi'
  vendorId?: string; // For ubah/detail/verifikasi modes
}

export const UnifiedVendorForm: React.FC<UnifiedVendorFormProps> = ({
  vendorType,
  mode,
  vendorId,
}) => {
  const router = useRouter();
  const params = useParams();
  
  const [step, setStep] = useState(1);
  const [formValues, setFormValues] = useState({
    1: null,
    2: null,
    3: null,
  });

  // Data fetching for edit modes
  const { data: vendorData, isLoading, error } = useVendorData(vendorId, vendorType, mode);

  // Determine vendor form type (for FormLegalitas)
  const vendorFormType = useMemo(() => {
    const categoryId = formValues[1]?.businessCategoryId;
    if (vendorType === 'domestic') {
      switch (categoryId) {
        case 1: return 'manufaktur';
        case 2: return 'atpm';
        case 3: return 'distributor';
        case 4: return 'importir';
        default: return 'atpm';
      }
    }
    return 'atpm'; // International default
  }, [formValues[1]?.businessCategoryId, vendorType]);

  // Draft refs for each step
  const draftRefs = {
    1: useRef(null),
    2: useRef(null),
    3: useRef(null),
  };

  // Step management
  const handleNext = (stepData: any) => {
    setFormValues(prev => ({ ...prev, [step]: stepData }));
    if (step < 3) setStep(step + 1);
  };

  const handleBack = () => {
    if (step > 1) setStep(step - 1);
  };

  // Form submission
  const handleSubmit = async (allData: any) => {
    try {
      if (mode === 'register') {
        await createVendor(vendorType, allData);
      } else if (mode === 'ubah') {
        await updateVendor(vendorType, vendorId!, allData);
      } else if (mode === 'verifikasi') {
        await approveVendor(vendorType, vendorId!, allData);
      }
      
      toast.success('Data berhasil disimpan');
      router.push(getSuccessPath(vendorType, mode));
    } catch (error) {
      toast.error('Gagal menyimpan data');
    }
  };

  // Render current step
  const renderStep = () => {
    switch (step) {
      case 1:
        return (
          <BaseFormAccountInformation
            mode={mode}
            vendorType={vendorType}
            defaultValues={formValues[1]}
            onNext={handleNext}
            draftRef={draftRefs[1]}
          />
        );
      
      case 2:
        return (
          <BaseFormLegalitas
            mode={mode}
            defaultValues={formValues[2]}
            vendorFormType={vendorFormType}
            onNext={handleNext}
            onBack={handleBack}
            draftRef={draftRefs[2]}
          />
        );
      
      case 3:
        return (
          <BaseFormKontrak
            mode={mode}
            defaultValues={formValues[3]}
            contractHistory={vendorData?.contractHistory}
            sellerId={vendorId}
            onNext={mode === 'detail' || mode === 'verifikasi' ? undefined : handleSubmit}
            onBack={handleBack}
            onSubmit={mode === 'register' || mode === 'ubah' ? handleSubmit : undefined}
            draftRef={draftRefs[3]}
          />
        );
    }
  };

  // Loading and error states
  if (isLoading) return <LoadingSpinner />;
  if (error) return <ErrorMessage />;

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      <PageTitle title={getPageTitle(vendorType, mode)} />
      <Breadcrumb items={getBreadcrumbItems(vendorType, mode)} />
      
      {renderStep()}
    </div>
  );
};
```

**Benefits:**
- Single component for all 8 page combinations (2 vendor types  4 modes)
- Eliminates 8 main page files
- Centralized step management, data fetching, and submission logic

## Part 7: Risk Mitigation

### Risk #1: Breaking Changes
**Mitigation:**
- Use feature flags to gradually roll out
- Maintain old components in parallel during migration
- Comprehensive testing before deployment
- Rollback plan ready

### Risk #2: Missing Edge Cases
**Mitigation:**
- Detailed code review of all components
- Identify and document all mode-specific behaviors
- Create compatibility layer for edge cases
- Add extensive logging for debugging

### Risk #3: Performance Regression
**Mitigation:**
- Profile before/after performance
- Optimize memoization in shared components
- Lazy load vendor-specific modules
- Test with large datasets

### Risk #4: Type Safety Issues
**Mitigation:**
- Strict TypeScript configuration
- Comprehensive type testing
- Use discriminated unions for mode/types
- Generate type documentation

---

## Conclusion

This consolidation plan provides a comprehensive approach to eliminating vendor form duplication while:

 **Preserving all existing functionality**  
 **Minimizing code duplication** by 60%+  
 **Allowing for future extensibility** through parameters  
 **Maintaining minimal risk of regression** through phased rollout  
 **Improving maintainability** for the development team  

The strategy follows these principles:

1. **Extract before consolidating** - identify shared patterns first
2. **Parameterize differences** - use props instead of duplication
3. **Test thoroughly** - unit, integration, and E2E tests
4. **Roll out gradually** - feature flags and monitoring
5. **Document everything** - clear guidelines for future developers

Based on my analysis, here's a summary of the consolidation opportunities:

## HIGH-LEVEL PATTERNS

**VendorDomestik Forms (3 steps  4 modes = 12 form components):**
- FormAccountInformation: 4 versions (Register: 723 lines, Ubah: 659, Detail: 579, Verifikasi: 454)
- FormLegalitas: 4 versions (Register: 870 lines, Ubah: 871, Detail: 734, Verifikasi: 350)
- FormKontrak: 4 versions (Register: 303 lines, Ubah: 429, Detail: 331, Verifikasi: 515)

**VendorInternasional Forms (3 steps  4 modes = 12 form components):**
- Similar structure with international-specific fields (location, product types, business entities)

## CONSOLIDATION OPPORTUNITIES

### 1. SHARED COMPONENTS (95% identical)
- **FormRow** component - repeated in every file
- **RequiredIndicator** - simple helper
- **Phone Controller Renders** - memoized functions identical across files
- **Select Controller Renders** - business category and entity selects
- **File Upload Controllers** - identical logic
- **Location Field Controllers** - Domestic vs International but otherwise identical

### 2. DYNAMIC BRAND FIELDS (FormLegalitas)
- **BUSINESS_CATEGORIES** array - duplicated 3 times (Register, Ubah, Detail)
- **DynamicBrandFields** component - duplicated 3 times
- **BrandSection** component - duplicated 3 times with minor variations
- **getBusinessCategoryByCode** - helper function duplicated 3 times
- **getDefaultBrand** function - duplicated 3 times

### 3. FORM STRUCTURE
- **Form schemas** - very similar with minor variations
- **Form defaults** - VENDOR_FORM_DEFAULTS, CONTRACT_FORM_DEFAULTS duplicated
- **Form types** - VendorFormInput vs UpdateVendorFormInput (nearly identical)

### 4. MAIN PAGE LOGIC
- **Step management** - repeated in all 4 pages
- **Form state management** - similar patterns
- **Draft saving** - identical logic in Register/Ubah
- **API transformation** - similar mappers used across pages
- **Error handling** - repeated patterns

## WHAT'S DIFFERENT

**Mode-specific features:**
- **Register**: Draft saving, test fill buttons, create API calls
- **Ubah**: Draft saving, test fill, update API calls, contract history/modals
- **Detail**: Read-only, navigation only, no draft/test fill
- **Verifikasi**: Read-only, approval/rejection, permission checks, simpler schemas

**Vendor type differences:**
- **Domestic**: Location management (province/city/district), business categories
- **International**: Country/city only, product types, international business entities

**FormLegalitas differences:**
- Dynamic brand requirements based on vendor type (manufaktur, atpm, distributor, importir)
- Each type requires different document fields

**FormKontrak differences:**
- Register: No contract history
- Ubah: DataTableBO for history, ModalTambahKontrak
- Detail: Simple HTML table for history
- Verifikasi: Custom div-based table, approval/rejection section

## CONSOLIDATION STRATEGY

### Phase 1: Extract Shared Components
1. Create shared FormRow component
2. Create shared form field renderers
3. Extract dynamic brand fields system

### Phase 2: Create Base Form Components
1. BaseFormAccountInformation with mode parameter
2. BaseFormLegalitas with type and mode parameters
3. BaseFormKontrak with mode parameter

### Phase 3: Create Unified Main Page
1. Unified vendor form with vendor type (domestic/international)
2. Form mode (register/ubah/detail/verifikasi) parameter
3. Reuse shared logic across all pages
